title: MIGRATION: Why Human Beings Were Built to Move
description: Birds do it, bees do it, even fishes in the seas do it. So why do we have such a hard time when people migrate from one place to another? Science writer Sonia Shah presents the evidence that migration is central to the human story -- and it just might save us from what’s coming next.
itunes:title: MIGRATION: Why Human Beings Were Built to Move
itunes:author: Next Big Idea Club

Science writer Sonia Shah presents the evidence that migration is central to the human story -- and it just might save us from what’s coming next.
